channel.title: ExodusPK | InstantPK | Pet Bosses | Staff spot open | 24/7 dedicated vps & Much
channel.description:
[center][FONT=Impact][SIZE=6]ExodusPK instant PKing and Much more![/SIZE][/FONT][/center]
[center][url=https://www.dropbox.com/s/5hbozmo5rg07xxw/Client.jar?dl=1] Download Now![/url][/center] [center] If the client does not open pm me on here! [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/t5ghl3.png[/img]
•Clipped projectiles for ranged and magic •Perfected Max hit, attack/defence formulas •Working Multi-Barrage (Wilderness & Non-Wilderness) •Unique home •Custom Teleporting animations & Death animations for players! •Customized clanchat with working lootshare as soon as you join •Nex Armours with HP Boosts •Correct Korasi Special Animation/GFX •Revenants with correct HP healing on attack •Auto-Voting & Donating work 100% •Donators get Primal Warriors & Frost dragons in their own dungeon, not in the wilderness •Bosses with unique drops such as Avatars dropping chaotics •Unique Pk points shop, items appear as you get more kills! •Nex with his different stages •Random PvP drops in wild! •Random artifact drops from Revenants! •Fully working duel arena! •Custom Barbarian Assault mini-game •Server announces when a 99 is achieved, aswel as it announces when a mystery box is opened + the rewards •Fully working MacBan system, so we can get rid of pesky VPN spammers •24/7 VPS Hosted •Fully working RFD Minigame for gloves •Custom fighpits minigame with 30 waves to achieve firecape, you then re-enter with the firecape and redo the 30 waves for a tokhaar-kal! •Corrupt items degrade upon use! •Instant Switching• •Working Vengance on NPCs and Players
- PVM COMBAT - • Perfect clipped following, and walking for NPCs. • Perfect attack styles, and emotes for all NPCs. • All specials working with correct effects for all weapons vs npcs. • Npcs don't walk on top of one another. • Can't diagnal fight or stand on Npc. • Multi barrage.
- BOSSES & MONSTERS - • King Black dragon • Dagannoth kings • Chaos elemental • Kalphite queen • Godwars Bosses & minions in the Godwars dungeon • Nex • Donator boss • Nomad • Barrelchest • Decaying Avatar, Avatar of Destruction, Avatar of Creation • Corperal beast • Bork • Tormented demons • Revenants • Unholy cursebearer • Strykewyrms • Frost dragons • Chaos tunnels • Mithril dragons • Slayer dungeon • Ranged & Mage training dungeon.
- MINIGAMES - • Fight caves • Fight pits • Warriors guild • Duel arena • Pest control • Barrows • Fun pk • Barbarian Defence • Spirit warriors • Champions challenge
- SKILLING - • Skillcapes. • Max cape and Completionist Cape! • Perfect slayer & slayer tasks. All monsters in the server are able to be assigned as slayer tasks. • Working herblore skill. You are able to clean herbs, and also make extreme potions, recover special, and super prayer potions. • Working mining skill. Mine ores with correct delays & rock emptying/refilling. • Working mining & smithing skill. Mine ores with correct delays & rock emptying/refilling. • Working fishing & cooking skills. You can fish all types of fish including rocktails, and cooking them as well. • Working agility skill with gnome agility course with correct delays, and animations with agility ticket rewards shop. • Working firemaking skill integrated with the clipping system, with global ashes dropping after fire burns out. • Working woodcutting skill with trees being chopped down to stumps, and spawning back. • Working fletching skill with interfaces, make longbows, short bows, arrows with animations. • Working crafting skill with interfaces, and animations. • Working Thieving skill. Thieving stalls at home that give good amounts of cash. • Working runecrafting skill with multipliers, pure essesnce and pouches. • Working farming skill. You can plant seeds, and pick herbs.
[IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/2f05eer.png[/img]
Unique Home! [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/2hgeqhk.png[/img]
Some Skilling is @ Home [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/2vi30qh.png[/img]
Boss Portal Room! [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/2i6nl6p.png[/img]
Primal Warriors -- Non Donator are in wild [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/aai3yr.png[/img]
SLAYER DUNGEONN [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/2cp6auo.png[/img]
Clipped NPCS -- Also the Primal Warriors at Donator zone [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/243rxqq.png[/img]
Champions Challenge [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/2udyhl2.png[/img][/center]

item.title: ExodusPK | InstantPK | Pet Bosses | Staff spot open | 24/7 dedicated vps & Much
item.dc:creator: @wimstr wimstr
item.description:
@wimstr wrote:

Ehh not really appealing.
I also don’t like the way you put your home and skilling area up.
I’m also not really ‘Suprised’, was hoping for more exciting content.

Goodluck.

Read full topic
item.source: ExodusPK | InstantPK | Pet Bosses | Staff spot open | 24/7 dedicated vps & Much

item.dc:creator: @nerd123456789 ...nerd123456789
item.description:
@nerd123456789 wrote:

[center][FONT=Impact][SIZE=6]ExodusPK instant PKing and Much more![/SIZE][/FONT][/center]

[center] Download Now![/center]
[center]
If the client does not open pm me on here!

•Clipped projectiles for ranged and magic
•Perfected Max hit, attack/defence formulas
•Working Multi-Barrage (Wilderness & Non-Wilderness)
•Unique home
•Custom Teleporting animations & Death animations for players!
•Customized clanchat with working lootshare as soon as you join
•Nex Armours with HP Boosts
•Correct Korasi Special Animation/GFX
•Revenants with correct HP healing on attack
•Auto-Voting & Donating work 100%
•Donators get Primal Warriors & Frost dragons in their own dungeon, not in the wilderness
•Bosses with unique drops such as Avatars dropping chaotics
•Unique Pk points shop, items appear as you get more kills!
•Nex with his different stages
•Random PvP drops in wild!
•Random artifact drops from Revenants!
•Fully working duel arena!
•Custom Barbarian Assault mini-game
•Server announces when a 99 is achieved, aswel as it announces when a mystery box is opened + the rewards
•Fully working MacBan system, so we can get rid of pesky VPN spammers
•24/7 VPS Hosted
•Fully working RFD Minigame for gloves
•Custom fighpits minigame with 30 waves to achieve firecape, you then re-enter with the firecape and redo the 30 waves for a tokhaar-kal!
•Corrupt items degrade upon use!
•Instant Switching•
•Working Vengance on NPCs and Players

  • PVM COMBAT -
    • Perfect clipped following, and walking for NPCs.
    • Perfect attack styles, and emotes for all NPCs.
    • All specials working with correct effects for all weapons vs npcs.
    • Npcs don’t walk on top of one another.
    • Can’t diagnal fight or stand on Npc.
    • Multi barrage.

  • BOSSES & MONSTERS -
    • King Black dragon
    • Dagannoth kings
    • Chaos elemental
    • Kalphite queen
    • Godwars Bosses & minions in the Godwars dungeon
    • Nex
    • Donator boss
    • Nomad
    • Barrelchest
    • Decaying Avatar, Avatar of Destruction, Avatar of Creation
    • Corperal beast
    • Bork
    • Tormented demons
    • Revenants
    • Unholy cursebearer
    • Strykewyrms
    • Frost dragons
    • Chaos tunnels
    • Mithril dragons
    • Slayer dungeon
    • Ranged & Mage training dungeon.

  • MINIGAMES -
    • Fight caves
    • Fight pits
    • Warriors guild
    • Duel arena
    • Pest control
    • Barrows
    • Fun pk
    • Barbarian Defence
    • Spirit warriors
    • Champions challenge

  • SKILLING -
    • Skillcapes.
    • Max cape and Completionist Cape!
    • Perfect slayer & slayer tasks. All monsters in the server are able to be assigned as slayer tasks.
    • Working herblore skill. You are able to clean herbs, and also make extreme potions, recover special, and super prayer potions.
    • Working mining skill. Mine ores with correct delays & rock emptying/refilling.
    • Working mining & smithing skill. Mine ores with correct delays & rock emptying/refilling.
    • Working fishing & cooking skills. You can fish all types of fish including rocktails, and cooking them as well.
    • Working agility skill with gnome agility course with correct delays, and animations with agility ticket rewards shop.
    • Working firemaking skill integrated with the clipping system, with global ashes dropping after fire burns out.
    • Working woodcutting skill with trees being chopped down to stumps, and spawning back.
    • Working fletching skill with interfaces, make longbows, short bows, arrows with animations.
    • Working crafting skill with interfaces, and animations.
    • Working Thieving skill. Thieving stalls at home that give good amounts of cash.
    • Working runecrafting skill with multipliers, pure essesnce and pouches.
    • Working farming skill. You can plant seeds, and pick herbs.

Unique Home!

Some Skilling is @ Home

Boss Portal Room!

Primal Warriors – Non Donator are in wild

SLAYER DUNGEONN

Clipped NPCS – Also the Primal Warriors at Donator zone

Champions Challenge
